moveInventory.LABEL_ScanBarcode: Scan location, then Serial # or SKU
moveInventory.LABEL_ClickContinue: Click continue to move them to destination
moveInventory.LABEL_CreateAdhoc: Create a list of products to move on fly by scanning location followed by product
moveInventory.MSG_DifferentUserIDWarning: Move request {moveRequestID} is being picked by {username}. Do you want to continue where {username} left off?
moveInventory.MSG_InvalidBarCodeData: Scan a valid location, then Serial # or SKU.
moveInventory.MSG_NoMatchingSourceLocation: Scanned location does not match with any source location.
moveInventory.MSG_NoMatchingDestinationLocation: Scanned location does not match with any destination location.
moveInventory.MSG_PickIncomplete: There are products that are not picked.
moveInventory.MSG_DepositIncomplete: There are products that are not deposited. Do you want to leave this screen?
moveInventory.MSG_TaskWillBeCancelled: This move execution is cancelled as all the products are marked short.
moveInventory.MSG_CancelWarningMessage: The move information is saved. Do you want to leave this screen?
moveInventory.MSG_RemoveTask: Are you sure you don't want to move this item?
moveInventory.MSG_GotoNextPage: Do you want to proceed to destination location to place the products?
moveInventory.MSG_InfoBannerPick: If available, start by scanning a location, then the Serial # or SKU.
moveInventory.MSG_InfoBannerDeposit: If available, start by scanning the suggested destination location, then the Serial # or SKU. If the suggested destination is full, switch to alternate locations.
moveInventory.MSG_InfoBannerDepositAdhoc: Start by scanning the destination location, then the Serial # or SKU. If the destination is full, switch to alternate locations.
moveInventory.MSG_ScreenDirty: There are unsaved changes in the screen. Do you wish to continue?
moveInventory.MSG_ScreenDirtyOld: The move execution data is not saved. Do you want to leave this screen
moveInventory.MSG_OpenExitingAdhoc: An adhoc move is currently in progress.Do you want to continue with that?
moveInventory.MSG_NoMoveRequestCreated: No products are picked for deposit

moveRequestList.VALUE_status: { status, select, IN_PROGRESS{In progress} COMPLETED{Completed} CANCELED{Cancelled} other{Not started}}
moveRequestList.VALUE_requestType: { type, select, GENERAL{General} PUTAWAY{Putaway} REPLENISHMENT{Replenishment} other{{type}} }

moveSummary.LABEL_ScanBarcode: Scan location, then serial # or SKU
moveSummary.LABEL_AdhocStatus: Adhoc move {status, select, IN_PROGRESS{in progress} NOT_STARTED{not started} CANCELLED{cancelled} other{complete}}
moveSummary.LABEL_status: Move {status, select, IN_PROGRESS{in progress} NOT_STARTED{not started} CANCELLED{cancelled} other{complete}}

recordShortage.LABEL_ApplyForAll: Apply the same reason for all
recordShortage.MSG_InvalidQuantity: Total quantity should less or equal to shortage quantity

alternateLocation.MSG_ErrorInvalidLoc: Invalid location. Rescan or enter the location again.
alternateLocation.MSG_ErrorMultipleLoc: Multiple locations found. Rescan or enter the location again.
